sub_title: QA project management and process improvement professional, Auditor
summary:
Available for job opportunities involving security and compliance in the field of quality assurance, process improvement, process auditing and appraisals. 

Result oriented, proactive enthusiastic team player, with strong analytical skills and an eye for detail. Independent, enthusiastic, proactive, pragmatic, multidisciplinary and creative. Experienced in different environments, like the B2B market and retail market.
International business experience as from 2001

Specialties and additional information:
Broad experience with:
Multiple ERP systems like SAP, MBS Axapta, Navision and Siebel.
Business process Improvement, Quality Management, Process Management, Conducting assessments, data analyses.
Provide training in the areas of SAP, process improvement, quality and company standards.
Quality assurance and project management methods like
PRINCE2, ITIL v2, CMMI SVC, CMMI DEV, SCAMPI C - B - A Appraisal.

For job opportunities you can contact me by E-mail:

Jeroen.Steltenpool@gmail.com

projects.title: Team lead conversion, Spirit, @ Campina
projects.description:
Conversion Lead Upgrade from SAP 4.0 to 5.0 ECC, dairy industry, business to business
Make sure to get the required information needed for the team building the conversion. Functional Designs have to be delivered by the Functional consultants including the correct mapping. Link the Functional Consultant to key users and make sure they communicate effectively. Review delivered documents and assist in completing them. If errors occur during upload analyze the errors (on customizing and data contents) and give feedback to the parties involved.

projects.title: Team lead, Sperro, Change to agency agreement for Spence & Cerro Collorado @ BHP Billiton
projects.description:
Lead Change to agency agreement for Spence & Cerro Colorado, Mining industry, business to business
Re arrange company code for Base metals for Chile as required in accordance to Chilean law for export customers. Sales need to flow directly through Compania Minerala Cerro Colorado and Spence Local Mining Units instead of selling through BMAG Swiss. 
•	Assure accuracy and in the efficiency of the final cutover process 
•	Creation and communication of a detailed cutover plan
•	Master data analysis in production environment
•	Assure master data alignment in all test systems 
•	Creation of automated master data upload by use of LSMW's and mass maintenance transaction

projects.title: Coordinator Systems Roll out, Spence @ BHP Billiton
projects.description:
Coordinate Systems Roll out of a new copper mine 
Incorporation of a new mine in the existing system landscape with its own company code a new LMU will be setup in M SAP and the Interface barcode system (CIM) used for track and trace within distribution and shipping process. The M SAP part and the CIM part are handled as two separate projects. The CIM part included an XI-interface between M SAP and CIM.
•	Coordinate global oriented development teams;
XI Development in Melbourne, 
XI Implementation in Chile, 
Finance department in Swiss, 
Project Management in the Netherlands, 
Program Management in Singapore. 
•	Blueprinting including extensive Risk Management on XI interface
•	Back-up procedure
•	Testing and analysis
•	Problem resolution
•	Training material
•	Go-live and after-live support

projects.title: Project Manager After care MBS Navision @ ONS-Irado
projects.description:
As result of the implementation of Navision at ONS-Irado a necessity for an organizational change occurred. Day to day operational in-house application management was required to coordinate technical and functional developments. Main goal was setting up, initiate, coordinate, and maintain a structure in accordance with ITIL. Task and responsibilities of the department functional development and technical development had to be made clear and practical. Where necessary ITIL processes had to be adopted by the organization and tested to practice.
•	Project management Prince2
•	Set up a key-user driven organization
•	Appoint and train a key-user for each process- and functional area and ITIL
•	Define the communication structure between the key-users and the organizational departments
•	Clarify the ITIL structure and the goal to the user organization and the ICT department
•	Incident Management
•	Change Management
•	Release Management
•	Train and coordinate 2 FTE to the role of functional developer
•	Coordinate for key user training with external provider
•	Task planning and performance feedback
•	Budget coordination

contributors.headline: QA project management and process improvement professional, Auditor

projects.title: IRC, Resource center IBM, ING, ABN-AMRO
projects.description:
Realize an internal organizational improvement to respond quicker and in alignment with the customer needs.
•	Set up organization structure according to Prince2
•	Initiate and plan the project in accordance to Prince2
•	Organize the resource center to be able to meet the specific customer agreements
•	Select, plan and coordinate resources required for this unit tasks

projects.title: Project Manager Siebel Releases @ Wolters Kluwer
projects.description:
Project Manager Siebel releases, Business to Consumer, Publishing Company
Focus for Siebel releases was to prioritize, develop and control the implementation of changes on the CRM / ERP systems. Take into account the budget and strategic limitations as set by the board of directors and set up a project organization in accordance with Prince2.
•	Project management Prince2
•	Release management
•	Continuity assurance Siebel CRM / ERP system
•	Problem and change prioritization communicate the priority accordingly
•	Coordinate and monitor the development of functional RFC’s
•	Improve service and quality to the customer (customer satisfaction level)
•	Improve information and process flow
•	Realize a higher level of efficiency between sub divisions and locations
•	Budget and resource control in accordance to Prince2
